name: Hack-a-Station
description:
The STATIONS are being ambushed! 

Five incinerators, Five stations.....

Collect the jewels and burn the Slimes! 

Remember, don't BURN THE PEARLS!

*Quick Tip: Adjust the VOLUME accordingly before playing*

Controls
  • A, S, D, F, G for each station's burners (from no. 1 to 5)
  • ESC to pause the game
Developer
  • @Zheister - Howard Zhang - In-Game Art, Title/Ending Music, SFX, Programmer
Developer Notes
  • The slider is a bit laggy, where it might not necessarily match the pearl count, FOLLOW the PEARL COUNT for reliable scoreboard.
  • The fire coming out of the incinerators may not come out at times, but it doesn't mean the cart is not destroyed; only a bug in the animation.
  • The rhythmic precision of the game is not incredibly high, but shouldn't heavily affect your gameplay experience.
Credits

Font : 

  • Pixallari by Zacchary Dempsey-Plante

In-Game Music :

  • Myths You Forgot by Camellia (feat. Toby Fox)
  • Level 1 Music: by @LegionGames

Code Reference: 

  • from @LegionGames on "Complete Godot Rhythm Game Tutorial" YouTube Video
